programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia.

programme.desc: Veteran sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Mike Wilbon debate and discuss hot sports topics, issues and events. An on-screen 'rundown' of the topics is a signature of the series, plus guests and responses to viewer e-mail.

programme.title: E60
programme.sub-title: The Band is on the Field
programme.desc: Marking the 40th anniversary of "The Play" that ended the 1982 Cal-Stanford football game. Jeremy Schaap catches up with players, coaches, band members, announcers, mascots, officials and former students who witnessed the game's wild finish.

programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia.

programme.title: SC Featured Special Presentation
programme.desc: Sports figures and others describe what Jackie Robinson's legacy means to them as part of a 75th anniversary celebration of the former Dodgers great breaking the MLB color barrier in 1947. Included: Dusty Baker; Oscar Robertson; Billie Jean King.

programme.title: The Undefeated: Sole Survivor
programme.desc: The story of sneaker consignment entrepreneur Jaysse Lopez, who started in Las Vegas with nothing (living homeless for six months) en route to building the multi-million dollar Urban Necessities empire.

programme.title: The Undefeated: I Run with Maud
programme.desc: A look at the lasting legacy on the running community of Ahmaud Arbery, who was shot and killed while running in 2020 in Georgia. The lifelong athlete and former high-school football player woke up and decided he wanted to go on a run, a harmless form of exercise that has shaped and impacted many lives for decades, but regretfully cost the life of one man.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Chronicling 1992 with Deion Sanders as he played simultaneously with Atlanta's Braves and Falcons in October, hustling to three cities in three days in an early phase of his two-sport success. Directed by Ken Rodgers and Erik Powers.

programme.title: Southern Hoops: A History of SEC Basketball
programme.desc: There may not have been two more entertaining and electrifying players in the SEC than Georgia's Dominique Wilkins and Auburn's Charles Barkley. The duo headlined the conference's successes in the early 1980s, while LSU's Coach Brown took two teams to the Men's Final Four. Coach Summitt won her first national titles with the Lady Vols in 1987 and 1989. Tennessee was pushed by an emerging power in Georgia under head coach Andy Landers.

programme.title: World of X Games
programme.sub-title: Vans BMX Presents: Scotty Cranmer's Whirlwind
programme.desc: BMX rider Scotty Cranmer's inspirational story, five years after a life-changing accident. Whirlwind chronicles his astronomical rise to notoriety and his positive "anything is possible" mindset that has kept him moving forward in the face of impossible odds.

programme.title: Daily Wager

programme.title: NASCAR Xfinity Series
programme.desc: The Production Alliance Group 300 from Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, Cal. California native Cole Custer (No. 00 car) won here for the second time last year and took ninth in last week's season opener at Daytona, won by Austin Hill (No. 21).

programme.title: The Perfect 10
programme.desc: Chronicling the only 10 men in the history of college and pro football to win the Heisman Trophy and be enshrined into the Pro Football Hall of Fame; an achievement so rare, "More men have walked on the moon."

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Indiana at Purdue. From Mackey Arena.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: Connecticut at DePaul. From Wintrust Arena. Geno Auriemma's Big East-leading Huskies search for some Midwest success, having lost at Notre Dame and Marquette earlier this season. They topped DePaul 94-51 at home on Jan. 23 despite Aneesah Morrow's 20 points and 12 boards.

programme.desc: The Production Alliance Group 300 from Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, Cal. California native Cole Custer (No. 00 car) won here for the second time last year and took ninth in last week's season opener at Daytona, won by Austin Hill (No. 21).

programme.title: NASCAR Xfinity Series

programme.title: NASCAR Cup Series
programme.desc: The Pala Casino 400 from Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, Cal. The Cup Series takes its final laps on the two-mile layout at this track that debuted in 1997, with plans to convert it to a short track. Californian Kyle Larson (No. 5 car) held off Austin Dillon (No. 3) for the win last year. Both drivers crashed out of last week's Daytona 500, won by Ricky Stenhouse Jr. (No. 47).

programme.title: Skip and Shannon: Undisputed
programme.desc: Skip and Shannon: Undisputed is a daily sports debate show starring Skip Bayless and Shannon Sharpe, and moderated by Jen Hale. Every day Skip and Shannon will give their unfiltered, incisive, passionate opinions on the biggest sports topics of the day.

programme.title: The Herd With Colin Cowherd
programme.desc: Host Colin Cowherd breaks down the biggest stories and interviews the biggest guests in sports. He is joined daily by news anchor Jason McIntyre.

programme.title: Skip and Shannon: Undisputed
programme.desc: Skip and Shannon: Undisputed is a daily sports debate show starring Skip Bayless and Shannon Sharpe, and moderated by Jen Hale. Every day Skip and Shannon will give their unfiltered, incisive, passionate opinions on the biggest sports topics of the day.

programme.title: Speak
programme.desc: Emmanuel Acho, Joy Taylor, and LeSean McCoy bring a fun, passionate, smart, and energetic discussion to the biggest sports topics of the day.

programme.title: NASCAR Race Hub
programme.desc: Daily motor-sports discussion and interviews from the "hub" of NASCAR in Charlotte.
